description: Fushikawa Kokoro is a student of class 2-S in Kawakami Academy and the heiress of the Fushikawa clan, one of the three noble families of Japan. She likes to brag about her noble lineage and is quite good in martial arts but never tries to fight stronger opponents. She considers herself superior to the rest of her school mates, viewing common people as "peasants" or "monkeys".
name: Fushikawa Kokoro
